name: TrumpWisdom
0:
”Alexa, ask Trump Wisdom for a quote”
”Alexa, open Trump Wisdom and get a quote”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trump wisdom
des: When you find yourself at a loss, perhaps stuck on a big decision and need some words of wisdom this skill will select one of the many inspirational quotes from Donald Trump and replay it just for you; it's what you need right now to make it through the day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
